mapper.sql: t1.id as id, t1.indiv_code as indivCode, t1.sku_id as skuId, t1.sku_name as skuName, t1.sku_code as skuCode, t1.warehouse_id as warehouseId, t1.warehouse_name as warehouseName, t1.measure_unit as measureUnit, t1.in_id as inId, t1.in_time as inTime, t1.in_code as inCode, t1.product_batchno as productBatchNo, t1.out_id as outId, t1.out_time as outTime, t1.out_code as outCode, t1.order_id as orderId, t1.order_code as orderCode, t1.rma_time as rmaTime, t1.rma_code as rmaCode, t1.rma_count as rmaCount, t1.wares_status as waresStatus, t1.stock_status as stockStatus, t1.remark as remark
mapper.select:
select from wms_indiv t1 where t1.indiv_code in ('test-test-test')
or t1.indiv_code in(#{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select from wms_indiv t1 where t1.stock_status='4' and t1.sku_code=#{skuCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t1.warehouse_id=#{warehouseId} and (t1.indiv_code ='test-test-test'
or t1.indiv_code in(#{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) )

select count(1) as total from wms_indiv t1 join wms_sales_order t2 on t1.out_id = t2.id join wms_sku t3 on t1.sku_id = t3.id
t1.stock_status = 4 and t1.push_status != '1'
mapper.update:
update wms_indiv
rma_code=#{rmaCode}, rma_time=#{rmaTime}, order_code=#{orderCode}, in_id=#{inId}, in_code=#{inCode}, in_time=#{inTime}, out_code=#{outCode}, out_time=#{outTime}, stock_status=#{stockStatus}, wares_status=#{waresStatus}, rma_count=rma_count+1
where indiv_code in
#{item}

update wms_indiv t1 set t1.out_time = #{outTime}, t1.stock_status = 4, t1.order_id = (select original_id from wms_delivery where id = t1.out_id and batch_id = #{batchId}), t1.order_code = (select original_code from wms_delivery where id = t1.out_id and batch_id = #{batchId}) where t1.stock_status = 3 and exists (select 1 from wms_delivery where id = t1.out_id and batch_id = #{batchId})

update wms_indiv t1 set t1.stockout_code = (select t2.flow_code from wms_indiv_flow t2 where t2.indiv_code = t1.indiv_code and t2.flow_type = #{flowType} and t2.flow_code = #{flowCode}), t1.stockout_time = (select t2.flow_time from wms_indiv_flow t2 where t2.indiv_code = t1.indiv_code and t2.flow_type = #{flowType} and t2.flow_code = #{flowCode}), t1.order_code = (select t2.original_code from wms_indiv_flow t2 where t2.indiv_code = t1.indiv_code and t2.flow_type = #{flowType} and t2.flow_code = #{flowCode}), t1.stock_status = #{stockStatus} where exists (select 1 from wms_indiv_flow t2 where t2.indiv_code = t1.indiv_code and t2.flow_type = #{flowType} and t2.flow_code = #{flowCode})

update wms_indiv t1 set t1.rma_code = (select t2.flow_code from wms_indiv_flow t2 where t2.indiv_code = t1.indiv_code and t2.flow_type = #{flowType} and t2.flow_code = #{flowCode}), t1.rma_time = (select t2.flow_time from wms_indiv_flow t2 where t2.indiv_code = t1.indiv_code and t2.flow_type = #{flowType} and t2.flow_code = #{flowCode}), t1.wares_status = (select t2.wares_status from wms_indiv_flow t2 where t2.indiv_code = t1.indiv_code and t2.flow_type = #{flowType} and t2.flow_code = #{flowCode}), t1.stock_status = #{stockStatus}, t1.rma_count = t1.rma_count+1 where exists (select 1 from wms_indiv_flow t2 where t2.indiv_code = t1.indiv_code and t2.flow_type = #{flowType} and t2.flow_code = #{flowCode})
mapper.insert:
select WMS_SEQ_COMMON.nextval from dual
insert into wms_indiv (id, stock_id, indiv_code,product_batchno,wares_status,stock_status,remark) values (#{id},#{stock.id},#{indivCode},#{batchNumber},#{waresStatus},#{stockStatus},#{remark})
mapper.update: update wms_indiv set stock_status='2',out_id='',out_code='',order_code='' where out_id=#{outId} and stock_status='3'
mapper.sql: select t1.id as id, t1.indiv_code as indivCode, t1.sku_id as skuId, t1.sku_name as skuName, t1.sku_code as skuCode, t1.warehouse_id as warehouseId, t1.warehouse_name as warehouseName, t1.measure_unit as measureUnit, t1.product_batchno as productBatchNo, t1.flow_type as flowType, t1.flow_id as flowId, t1.flow_time as flowTime, t1.flow_code as flowCode, t1.flow_goods_id as flowGoodsId, t1.wares_status as waresStatus, t1.enabled as enabled
mapper.update: update wms_indiv_flow t1 set t1.enabled = 1, t1.flow_time=#{flowTime} where t1.flow_type = #{flowType} and exists (select 1 from wms_delivery where id = t1.flow_id and batch_id = #{batchId})
mapper.select: select from wms_indiv t1 where t1.indiv_code=#{va} and rownum<2

sql.set: out_id=#{outId}, out_code=#{outCode}, out_time=#{outTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_id=#{orderId}, order_code=#{orderCode}, stock_status = #{stockStatus}

mapper.update:
update wms_indiv
where out_id=#{outId}
update wms_indiv set prepare_id=#{prepareId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prepare_code=#{prepareCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_status=#{stockStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id}

update wms_indiv
where prepare_id=#{prepareId}
update wms_indiv set stock_status=#{stockStatus}, prepare_id = null where prepare_id=#{prepareId}
